transcript.content: Good afternoon. LAMA GP surgery. How can I help you today?
Hi, I need help with a a issue.

My name is Scott Morton and I was born on January 16, 1942.
Thank you, Scott Morton. I've located your records. How can we assist you today?
I have been dealing with a for a few days.
Let me schedule an appointment to address your a.

I have an opening with Dr. Patel at 2 PM tomorrow. Does that work for you?
Great, you're now booked with Dr. Patel at 2 PM tomorrow. See you then!
